document.masterDocTitle: Review of Aphidiinae parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of the Middle East and North Africa: key to species and host associations

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Aphidiinae parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of the Middle East and North Africa: key to species and host associations

subSubSection.paragraph:
SAUDI ARABIA • 1 ♂ ; Abha; May 2013 ;
Uroleucon
sp. on
Sonchus oleraceus
• 5 ♀♀ ; Abha-Mahala College campus; Nov. 2012 ;
Uroleucon
sp. on
Sonchus oleraceus
; Z. Ahmad leg. ( DPPZ ).

heading.emphasis: Distribution in the Middle East and North Africa

subSubSection.paragraph:
All records for
Praon dorsale (Haliday 1833)
associated with
Uroleucon
aphids in the Middle East and North Africa refer to
Praon yomenae
. Record of
P. yomenae
on
Acyrthosiphon pisum ( Chaouche & Laamari 2015 )
, is probably referring to a misidentification of
Praon barbatum Mackauer
, which is very similar to
P. yomane
.
